Package equipments.AirConditioning

Interface AirConditioningInternalControlI

All Superinterfaces:
AirConditioningUserAndControlI
All Known Subinterfaces:
AirConditioningInternalControlCI
All Known Implementing Classes:
AirConditioning, AirConditioningInternalControlConnector, AirConditioningInternalControlInboundPort, AirConditioningInternalControlOutboundPort
public interface AirConditioningInternalControlI extends AirConditioningUserAndControlI
The interface AirConditioningInternalControlI defines the signatures of the services offered by the air conditioning to its thermostat controller.

Description

Invariant

 invariant      true        // no invariant

Created on : 2023-10-10

Author:
Daniel SIMA, Walter ABELES
